meanings.definition: The state or quality of being tearful.
meanings.sent1: Her lachrymosities were evident as she wiped away tears.
meanings.sent2: The movie's sad ending brought lachrymosities to many viewers.
meanings.sent3: Despite the comedy, the play had moments of lachrymosities that surprised the audience.
meanings.sent4: The lachrymosities of the rainy day matched her somber mood.
meanings.sent5: The lachrymosities of the farewell scene left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: An instance of weeping or shedding tears.
meanings.sent1: The child's lachrymosities were due to losing her favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: During the emotional speech, his lachrymosities moved the audience.
meanings.sent3: His exaggerated lachrymosities over a small paper cut made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The lachrymosities of the storm seemed to mirror her inner turmoil.
meanings.sent5: The lachrymosities of the character in the play were so convincing, they felt real to the audience.
